section.name: profile
section.p: A profile is a collection of projects and repositories that are logically to be considered a unit. A profile can provide a consistent set of installable dependencies, or tagged versions of cvs modules to be used.

subsection.name: module
subsection.p: An individual module to be included. While a complete module can be defined here, typically one is referenced via href. For a complete description, see the documentation for module.

tr.td: URI of the file containing the module definition

subsection.name: project
subsection.p: An individual project to be extended. For a complete description, see the documentation for project.

tr.td: Name of the project to be modified
Specifies the name of the subdirectory relative to the pkgdir specified in the workspace definition.

subsection.name: repository
subsection.p: An repository to be included. While a complete repository can be defined here, typically one is referenced via href. For a complete description, see the documentation for repository.

tr.td: URI of the file containing the repository definition
